sentences.en: an unholy alliance between the medical profession and the pharmaceutical industry
sentences.cn: 医疗界与医药业的不当联盟

sentences.en: China will not enter into alliance with any big power.
sentences.cn: 中国不同任何大国结盟.

sentences.en: In 1882 Germany, Austria, and Italy formed the Triple Alliance.
sentences.cn: 1882年，德国、奥地利和意大利组成了三国同盟。

sentences.en: In the formative years their alliance carried all before it.
sentences.cn: 在草创阶段，他们的联盟所向披靡。

sentences.en: On the face of it, their marriage seems an improbable alliance.
sentences.cn: 表面上看，他们的婚姻似乎是个荒谬的结合。

sentences.en: PLATFORM is an alliance of more than 80 rail-user groups.
sentences.cn: PLATFORM公司是80多个铁路用户组的联盟。

sentences.en: Relief workers in alliance with local charities are trying to help the victims.
sentences.cn: 救济人员与当地慈善机构联合起来，设法帮助灾民。

sentences.en: She had contracted an alliance with a wealthy man of rank.
sentences.cn: 她和一位有身份的富人联姻.

sentences.en: The Alliance for Progress reached its apogee during the first half of the decade.
sentences.cn: 这十年中的前五年是进步联盟迈向顶峰的时期。

sentences.en: The alliance stands ready to do what is necessary.
sentences.cn: 联盟已准备好采取必要行动。

sentences.en: The new alliance was very much in evidence.
sentences.cn: 新的联盟上星期很引人注目.

sentences.en: There are signs that the alliance is now fraying at the edges.
sentences.cn: 有迹象表明该联盟现正分崩离析。

sentences.en: There is an alliance between logic and metaphysics.
sentences.cn: 逻辑与形而上学之间有类似之处.

sentences.en: They made an alliance against the common enemy.
sentences.cn: 他们联合起来抵御共同敌人.

sentences.en: What will be the effect of the alliance between IBM and Apple?
sentences.cn: 若IBM公司和苹果公司联手将会有什么效果呢？

sentences.en: Yet now he was here, in extremis, to seek an alliance.
sentences.cn: 然而现在他就在这里，在绝境中寻求联盟。

phrases.tran_cn: 星空联盟（全球最大的航空联盟）
战略联盟（两家公司的合作安排，两者决定分享资源，互补长短）；策略联盟

trans.tran_en: an arrangement in which two or more countries, groups etc agree to work together to try to change or achieve something
